I know that i can send the  lineItems as a html table string, but i'd like to loop over the line items to show a order summary. Is this possible? There is a request to accept arrays (which would solve this issue) <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Looping-and-conditions-in-email/td-p/228521> but I was wondering if there is some sort of fancy hubl syntax i can add in my templates to get this to work?
Ideally I do not want to add the html to a custom property as then the marketing team loses the ability to customise as they require
